page.title: 05People
page.content: _Many of the people who live in this area also work here.Most work on farms,but some work at country crafts like basket making. In recent years a few houses have been bought by people who work outside the area but prefer to live in the country. There is very little building land in the area so the population is not expected to grow very much. The sort of people who choose to live here are often young people who want their children to grow up in the country or old people who have retired to the country after an active life elsewhere. The local people can often trace their ancestry in the area back for several generations.Many families are related to each other.
